item.title: Samsung Chromebook Plus Demo at CES 2017
item.description: This video is a quick hands on the Samsung Chromebook Plus by Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed at CES 2017.

item.title: Toshiba CB35-C3350 Chromebook 2 Review
item.description: A video review of the Toshiba CB35-C3350 Chromebook 2 released in September 2015 by Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed.

item.title: Toshiba CB35-C3300 Chromebook 2 Review
item.description: A 5-minute video review of the Toshiba CB35-C3300 Chromebook released in September 2015.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook C201 Review by Chrome Unboxed
item.description: A video review of the 4 GB ASUS Chromebook C201 (C201PA-DS02) by Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed.

item.title: ASUS Chromebook Flip Review by Chrome Unboxed
item.description: A video review of the 4 GB ASUS Chromebook Flip (C100PA-DB02) by Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed.

item.title: Acer Chromebook 15 C910-54M1 Review
item.description: A quick review by Robby Payne of the Acer Chromebook 15 C910-54M1, which is powered by an Intel core i5 processor.

item.title: Acer Chromebook 13 After 9 Months
item.description: A short video review of the Acer Chromebook 13 CB5-311-T7NN after 9 months of usage.

item.title: Chomebook Pixel vs Macbook Pro - 2015 Models Compared
item.description: This video by Waj Syed from MW Technology compares the Chromebook Pixel 2 with the latest version of the MacBook Pro.

item.title: Unboxing and Review of the Chromebook Pixel 2 LS
item.description: This video by DetroitBORG gives you some good impressions of the new Chromebook Pixel LS from unboxing to naming the hardware components, comparing it with the predecessor, and demonstrating the software.

item.title: Acer Chromebook 15 C910-C37P Unboxing
item.description: This is a short video of Robby Payne unboxing one of the latest Chromebooks out there, the Acer Chromebook 15 C910-C37P.
